metadata.description:
DISAPPEAR is the follow up to SPACE & TIME and the second drop in a 4 part series. The song explores our fixation with attention in the digital age, and how we constantly compare our own lives to others.

"Watch how quick that vanity turns into insanity, mirror mirror in my palm please provide my fantasy."

lyrics.text:
One of the dopest
That they sleep on
That ok I be on
Shit that just so beyond 
Ahead my time by eons 

Don’t like it
Then they bite it 
Then they hype it
Then it be gone

That’s just how it goes 
Things move fast in this 
Region
Of the galaxy 
Stop chasin phalacies 
Cool for a hot 15 then 
Sick of you a tragedy 

Watch how quick the vanity 
Turns into insanity 
Mirror mirror in my palm 
Please provide my fantasy 
And block out anything that’s in the way
Recapture ur happiness is just a click away

Please confirm your not a robot 
On a soap box 
Regurgitating talking points 
Are those even ur own thoughts?

I mold minds like play dough
Philosophize like Galileo 
Over your head like a halo 
Inside a web of lies I’m trying to help u get untangled.

One of these days the world gona wake up 
Wash away the make up 
Drown in our own reflection 
Musta missed the lesson 

Tried to unplug 
made me feel so disconnected 
I think we all addicted to the drama and attention.

I wanna live the life that I see on the screen 
And anything less ain’t success to me

I wanna make em all jealous 
And be big on the scene. And when they ask me how I'm doing, I'll say living the dream.

metadata.name: Disappear #1
metadata.title: Disappear
